---
title: "Australasian Applied Statistics Conference 2026"
---

We would like to cordially invite you to Queensland for the Australasian Applied Statistic Conference 2026 (AASC2026) to be held from the 30th November to the 4th December 2026 at the [**Mantra Mooloolaba Beach**](/https://www.mantramooloolababeach.com.au/) on the Sunshine Coast.

![](images/MooloolabaBeach.jpg)

## Register your interest
If you would like to keep up to date with any major announcements regarding the AASC 2026 conference, [please register your interest here](https://forms.office.com/r/YDFLimcmGj) 

## Sponsorship 

If you or your organisation are interested in sponsoring the conference, please email interest to [michael.mumford@dpi.qld.gov.au](mailto:michael.mumford@dpi.qld.gov.au)

## Contact Information

For general inquiries regarding the AASC 2026 conference, please contact the secretary Michael Mumford at [michael.mumford@dpi.qld.gov.au](mailto:michael.mumford@dpi.qld.gov.au)
